original_title: Forgotten Pilots: The Air Transport Auxiliary (ATA) 1939-1946
overview: Short documentary celebrating the achievements and passion of the women who were ferry pilots during World War II. They transported all types of aircraft, often in hazardous conditions, for Britainâ€™s Air Transport Auxiliary (ATA).
